Description: Papyrus; Hieratic text; recto: blank; verso: administrative text.
Curator's comments: Ptahhotep mss are being studied by F. Hagen (Camnbridge) and A. Heyne (Basel). Translation of text: R. B. Parkinson, The Tale of Sinuhe and Other Egyptian Poems (1999), pp. 246-72; The accounts on the verso can be dated to the reign of Amenemhat III: R. Pirelli, 'Two new stela from Mersa Gawasis', RdE 58 (2007), 87-110 (es. 92-3).
See F. Hagen, An Ancient Egyptian Literary Text in Context; The Instruction of Ptahhotep (OLA 218; Leuven; Peeters), 2012, 131-42.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381274) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381274)
